Atanatar: image=[[Image:Matěj Čadil - Atanatar I of Gondor.jpg
caption="Atanatar I of Gondor" by [[Matěj Čadil]]

column8: South}}</ref> aged 268 years) was the tenth [[King of Gondor]], ruling for 81 years, from Third Age 667 until his death.

{{disambig-more: He was the son of [[Turambar (King of Gondor)
Atanatar: Turambar]], the great conqueror of the [[Easterlings]]. Atanatar's reign, however, was uneventful, and he was succeeded by his son [[Siriondil (King of Gondor)

{{disambig-more: ''Atanatar'' is [[Quenya]] for "Father of Men", a title given to the [[Atanatari]] of the [[First Age]]; from ''[[atan]]'' "Man" and ''[[atar]]'' "father".
